bibl.title: Chronological Observations on Later Byzantine Documents.
bibl.note: 1. Justinian's Novella 47 and its application in Egypt. - 2. Oxyrhynchus and the nomenclature of the emperor Tiberius II. - 3. Mauricius' death and Phocas' ascension to the throne as reflected in the papyri. - 4. The dating formula of S.B. I, 4662.
bibl.seg: Worp Klaas Anthony, Chronological Observations on Later Byzantine Documents.

1. Justinian's Novella 47 and its application in Egypt. - 2. Oxyrhynchus and the nomenclature of the emperor Tiberius II. - 3. Mauricius' death and Phocas' ascension to the throne as reflected in the papyri. - 4. The dating formula of S.B. I, 4662.
